# Vassal Armor
## Overview
Worn by emissaries and proxies of powerful planar rulers and deities, this suit of *+3* *[[Exalted (Arm_ShldSpcAb)|exalted]]** half-plate* is reinforced with Ysgardian heartwire, which increases the wearerâ€™s AC by +2 solely for purposes of the roll to confirm a critical hit.

Strong abjuration; CL 18th; [[Craft Magic Arms and Armor (Feat)|Craft Magic Arms and Armor]], *[[Protection From Evil (Spell)|protection from evil]]**;* Price 38,250 gp; Cost to Create 20,250 gp + 1,620 XP.

**Source:** Book of Exalted Deeds (WotC), pg. 113
